about_the_game:
Game Overview
"Budding Destiny" is an interactive campus love game that tells the beautiful story of the male and female protagonists from meeting in junior high school to falling in love in high school. Players will play the male protagonist and experience the whole process of the two from their first love to a firm relationship through a series of choices and interactions. The game is full of warmth, romance and youthful memories, and every decision made by the player will affect the development and ending of the story.

Game Features
Emotional interaction: Through a variety of choices, players can experience real campus love and feel the ups and downs of emotions.
Multiple endings: The game has multiple endings, and players can experience different emotional journeys according to their choices.
Exquisite graphics: The game graphics are exquisite and the scenes are delicate, allowing players to experience campus life in an immersive way.
Rich plot: The plot is delicate and rich, covering many aspects such as learning, friendship, and love, allowing players to experience a complete growth process.
